question: Which of the following Amendments is also known as the 'Mini Constitution' of India?
explanation: The 42nd amendment to Constitution of India, officially known as The Constitution (Forty-second amendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency (25 June 1975 â€“ 21 March 1977) by the Indian National Congress government headed by Indira Gandhi. It laid down the Fundamental Duties of Indian citizens to the nation.
